file_summary: This Java class, `Vet`, represents a veterinarian within the Spring PetClinic application. It extends the `Person` class, inheriting common attributes like first name and last name. The class is annotated as a JPA `@Entity` and mapped to the "vets" table in the database. Its core functionality involves managing the specialties a veterinarian possesses. It includes a `@ManyToMany` relationship with `Specialty` entities, stored in a `Set`, which is eagerly fetched. The class provides methods to access and manage these specialties, including retrieving them as a sorted list, counting their number, and adding new specialties. This design enables the system to store and display detailed information about each veterinarian, including their professional areas of expertise.
